basics.name: Gunjan Goyal
basics.label: Bachelor's of Technology
basics.summary: Final-year undergraduate student with a strong foundation in machine learning, computer vision, and convolutional neural networks (CNNs). Proficient in Python and experienced with deep learning frameworks such as OpenCV, TensorFlow, and PyTorch. Passionate about developing AI-driven solutions and leveraging data-driven insights for real-world applications.

work.name: Institute for Advanced Study, Princeton University
work.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.

education.institution: Indira Gandhi Delhi Technical University for Women

awards.title: Dr J.K. Pal Memorial Award
awards.summary: The Dr. JK Pal Memorial Award is a prestigious honor presented by IEEE to recognize outstanding dedication, leadership, and contributions to the IEEE community. This award is given to the Student Branch Chairperson for demonstrating exceptional commitment to advancing technology within the IEEE student branch.

awards.title: Outstanding Student Volunteer Award
awards.summary: The Outstanding Student Volunteer Award by IEEE recognizes exemplary commitment and service to the IEEE community. It honors students who have made significant contributions through technical activities, mentorship, and organizational initiatives, fostering innovation and professional growth.

certificates.name: Application of ML in Cyber Security
